Havrylyuk etÂ al. screened novel 4-thiazolidinone benzothiazole derivatives against ovarian, renal, prostate, leukaemia, melanoma, lung, colon, CNS and breast cancer cell lines. The thioxothiazolidine acetamide benzothiazole 52 ( Figure 32) showed the most promising anti-cancer activity. The SAR studies pinpointed that the introduction of 4-chloro-phenoxy- N-(4-methoxyphenyl)-acetamide substitutions on position 5 of the 4-thiazolidinones ring enhanced the anti-cancer potential
53 .
